Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/Sw: I want to play on the swing...
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/be: It's bedtime for Maple, [Ari]... I'm so sleepy!
Between you and me, [Ari], momma's really good at telling stories.
Being a noble sounds rough. They should just put me in charge, I could handle it for them.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/bu: When we grow up, Luc is going to be a super famous bug guy! A bugologist! I just know it!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/cl: I don't mind cleaning. A good Royal should have a keen understanding of the jobs of her subjects.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/de: Dell says Lady Adeline knighted you, [Ari]. But I thought only a king could do that...
Dell says she'll be good and won't jump in the fountain... yeah right!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/fn: Friday night always reminds me that adults need to play, too. Good for them!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/go: Many thanks for teaching me about the life of a commoner such as yourself.
Good night, [Ari]! I, Queen Maple, take my leave of you.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/gr: Where did you live before you came here? Have you ever been to the Capital?
That's where the royal family lives, you know!
You can ask me anything, I know aaaaaall about them.
Hi! Are you the new farmer? My name's Maple!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/ha: Have you had the food my sister Reina makes yet? It's really yummy!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/he: Hear ye hear ye! On this morning you are in the presence of Queen Maple!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/in: That's too many. When I become queen, I'm outlawing all that!
Did you know royalty eats with ten different kinds of spoons and twenty kinds of forks?
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/ju: Miss Juniper sure does have a loud laugh, huh.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/lu: Luc better not bring his bugs to dinner again...
Luc's teaching me about bees! I just wanna hear about the Queens though.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/ma: Tomorrow's the Saturday Market! Maybe I'll see Lady Adeline around!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/mo: Mama and Daddy sure do love each other. I know I'm supposed to be grossed out, but it just makes me happy.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/ol: Mr. Errol told me how royalty ate in olden times. He sure knows a lot.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/po: We must always check our dinner for poison. Such is the life of a royal!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/qu: The queen bee should get a little crown, don't you think?
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/ra: I don't really get what's going on anymore but the rain sure is pretty!
Rainy days are kind of sleepy... yawn...
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/re: Hungry? Great! I accept payment in tesserae, or candy.
Oh, I'm supposed to serve you? That's not very royal...
Hi, [Ari]! I'll take today's special, and a glass of orange juice!
[Ari]! I bid you a very royal welcome to my domain!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/ro: I dreamt Lady Adeline invited me to a royal brunch.
Royal dinner... and then a royal sleep... that's what Queen Maple wants...
[Ari]! Accompany me as we approach my royal domain! All looks to be in order... most pleasing...
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/sc: Now I think they're kind of cute. For bugs anyway.
I used to be scared of bugs, but it's hard to stay that way when you have Luc for a brother!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/sh: I have a very important list for him.
[Ari], have you seen Balor? I have to find him before he goes to the Capital.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/sl: I'll call it the Sleeping Dragon PALACE. I can't wait!
Miss Celine's cottage is so cute. One day I'll have a house too. But mine will be more fancy, like Lady Adeline's house.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/tr: Time for bed! Royalty needs their beauty sleep.
We have questions about potions, and Juniper's the potion expert! PLUS she's got a big fluffy dog!
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Banked Lines/we: Okay you got me, I'm not LADY Maple... yet. But I'll still accept any tribute in the form of snacks.
Lady Maple welcomes you to Mistria, and accepts tribute in the form of cash or snacks.
